data.title: Video portal of The University of Manchester
data.text:
Maheshi Gunawardane PhD Philosophy Author: Anthony Morris Added on Mon Feb 12 17:29:00 GMT 2024 Duration: 0:02:44 Interview with PhD Philosophy student Maheshi describing their motivation for postgraduate research study and the way the Doctoral Academy supports their research.
